validationReport.statement: PDF file is not compliant with Validation Profile requirements.

rule.description: DeviceCMYK shall only be used if a device independent DefaultCMYK colour space has been set or if a DeviceN-based DefaultCMYK colour space has been set when the DeviceCMYK colour space is used or the file has a PDF/A OutputIntent that contains a CMYK destination profile

check.context: root/document[0]/pages[2](6 0 obj PDPage)/Group[0](180 0 obj PDGroup)/colorSpace[0]
check.errorMessage: DeviceCMYK colour space is used without CMYK output intent profile

rule.description: For every font embedded in a conforming file and used for rendering, the glyph width information in the font dictionary and in the embedded font program shall be consistent
rule.test: renderingMode == 3 || widthFromFontProgram == null || widthFromDictionary == null || Math.abs(widthFromFontProgram - widthFromDictionary) <= 1
